description.value:
Consumable (Substance)

Yaladai is a powerful stimulant that grants extreme clarity, improving relaxation and focus. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next minute, the creature experiences a high that increases their current and maximum force points by [[/r 2d4]]. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or experience a low that lasts 1 hour, their current and maximum force points are reduced by [[/r 2d4]]. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw to resist addiction.

Â 

Yaladai

Yaladai is a powerful stimulant that grants extreme clarity, improving relaxation and focus. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next minute, the creature experiences a high that increases their current and maximum force points by [[/r 2d3]]. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or experience a low that lasts 10 minutes, their current and maximum force points are reduced by [[/r 2d3]]. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw to resist addiction.
